name: Sheet Pan Caprese Chicken

ingredients.name: Greek Dressing
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or your choice of dressing, prepared

preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Slice cheese into eight slices. Slice tomatoes into four slices each. Set aside.
Cut chicken breasts in half. Place chicken on lined pan; coat with seasoning.
Roast until chicken is cooked through, about 15–18 min. Top chicken with sliced tomato and cheese during the last 5 min of cooking.
To serve, drizzle dressing on top. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.
tips: Swap field tomatoes for cherry tomatoes—simply toss on sheet pan while chicken is cooking.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy green salad and 1⁄2 cup pasta or rice.
